findings.title: Owner cannot set a max tx amount
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to set a maximum transaction amount.

findings.title: A02.Owner cannot pause
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to pause it.

findings.title: A03.Owner cannot blacklist
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to blacklist.

findings.title: A04.Owner cannot take back ownership
findings.description: The owner of the contract is unable to regain ownership once it has been transferred or renounced.

findings.title: No Proxy Contract
findings.description: The contract does not utilize a proxy, which can lead to issues with upgradability and flexibility.

findings.title: A06.Owner cannot limit the number of wallet holdings
findings.description: The owner of the contract cannot limit the number of wallet holdings.

findings.title: A07.Owner cannot set the selling time interval
findings.description: The owner of the contract is unable to set a trading cooldown or selling time interval.
